login.title: Login
login.usernameValidation: Username must be at least 3 characters, and can only contain letters, numbers
login.passwordValidation: Password must be at least 5 characters
login.empty: Username and password cannot be empty

home.priceRangeAlert: First price cannot be greater than the second price.

addCourse.title: Add Course
addCourse.name: Name
addCourse.nameArValidation: Name (Arabic) must be at least 3 characters, single space seperator between words and can only contain Arabic letters
addCourse.nameEnValidation: Name (English) must be at least 3 characters, single space seperator between words and can only contain English letters
addCourse.descriptionArValidation: Description (Arabic) must contain Arabic letters and single space seperator between words
addCourse.descriptionEnValidation: Description (English) must contain English letters and single space seperator between words
addCourse.imageValidation: Image must be a valid URL starting with http or https

course.deleteDialogTitle: Are you sure to delete this course?
